info.name: ESPN Fantasy Baseball Redesign - Grey
info.description: ESPN changed their layout with baseball...This is a grey redesign...It's still a work in progress as there are some things I need to tweak...will be updating when I get some time...
info.additionalInfo:
-- Minor Color Changes to Have Live Scoring and Sortable Stats Easily Identifiable; Different Hover Color For Players ** 4/7/10 --

-- Update for Standings Page ( Row Colors ) and Update for Live Scoring on ESPN page ** 4/5/10 ** --

-- After You Draft, Changes are Made...This update fixes those changes ** 3/8/10 ** --

-- Color Changes for Waiver Wire Pickups and Pending Transactions; Other Minor Tweaks ** 3/11/10 ** --

-- Chat Area Fixes ** 3/14/10 ** --

-- Color Change for Player Tables; Other Minor Fixes/Changes ** 3/25/10 ** --

-- Changed Default Fantasy Cast Button to Custom ** 4/4/10 ** --

BEFORE: http://i663.photobucket.com/albums/uu355/konphlikt/espnbaseballb4.png

AFTER:  http://i663.photobucket.com/albums/uu355/konphlikt/baseballdark.png

Other ESPN games styles available...Just click on my profile...

** Update  2/18/10 **

Changed background from repeating base64 to moz linear gradient ( FF 3.6+ only )..Other minor fixes..More later..
